org.jruyi.core

Interface RuyiCore.IRuyiCore

  • Enclosing class:
    RuyiCore

    public static interface RuyiCore.IRuyiCore
    This interface defines all the methods that a RuyiCore provider has to implement. It is used to separate the implementation of the provider from the API module.
    Since:
    2.2

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IChannelAdminConfiguration channelAdminConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration to configure the ChannalAdmin.
      IBufferFactory defaultBufferFactory()
      Returns the default buffer factory service.
      IFilter<?,?> getMsgLogFilter()
      Returns the filter of MsgLog.

      Returns the Scheduler service.
      ITimerAdmin getTimerAdmin()
      Returns the TimerAdmin service.
      IBufferFactory newBufferFactory(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new buffer factory with the specified name.
      IFileKeyStoreBuilder newFileKeyStoreBuilder()
      Returns a builder to build an ISslContextParameters from key store files.

      Returns a builder of ssl filter.
